mapper.select: select avg(score) as aveScore, class.id as clsId, examgradesub.id as egsId, subject.name as subjectName FROM ustudy.examinee join ustudy.subscore on examinee.id = subscore.stuid join ustudy.class on class.id = examinee.class_id join examgradesub on examgradesub.id = subscore.exam_grade_sub_id join ustudy.subject on subject.id = examgradesub.sub_id where examgradesub.examid = #{eid} and examgradesub.grade_id = #{gid} group by examinee.class_id, examgradesub.sub_id order by aveScore desc
